name: GPSMovieGenerator
short_description:
This is a python script for creating videos from GPS track and media data. It renders a moving map with the respective track. On that map, media thumbnails are displayed. These pop up when the track reaches them.
If desired, an overlay map and some track statistics may be added to the video.

Python3.3 will be needed

An example video can be found here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O_IiXrOfFCw&hd=1

To hard to use this script or don't know about linux/python etc ? get in touch with me for RENDERING YOUR VIDEO

Consider donating to this project: https://sourceforge.net/donate/?user_id=4005050
summary: Create videos from image and video data linked with GPS tracks
